item.title: Baldhead Diesel Mechanic Garage
item.description:
About Us

Baldhead Diesel Mechanic Garage specializes in the repair of heavy equipment and the installation of automatic tarpaulin systems. With a team of skilled technicians, we ensure reliable service and high-quality workmanship to keep your machinery running smoothly.

Our Services

  • Heavy Equipment Repair: Expert repair services for all types of heavy machinery
  • Tarpaulin Systems: Professional installation of automatic tarpaulin systems
  • Diesel Services: Comprehensive diesel engine maintenance and repairs
  • Equipment Maintenance: Regular maintenance programs to prevent breakdowns

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Terrance Raghunanan (Kurth)
  • Phone: 734-1245
  • Email: kurth.raghunanan6@gmail.com

item.title: Shoe Lab
item.description:
About Us

Shoe Lab specializes in high-quality leather crafts and expert shoe repair services. With a commitment to craftsmanship and customer satisfaction, we breathe new life into your favorite footwear and offer bespoke leather goods tailored to your style.

Our Services

  • Leather Crafts: High-quality handcrafted leather goods and accessories
  • Shoe Repair: Expert repair and restoration of all types of footwear
  • Bespoke Leather Goods: Custom-made leather items tailored to your specifications

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Andy Samaroo
  • Phone: 782-5643
  • Email: andysamaroo09@gmail.com
